title: Tablecloth, 1979-22-2-a, late 19th century
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 473.7 x 236.2 cm (15 ft. 6 1/2 in. x 7 ft. 9 in.)
creditline: Gift of Carnegie Corporation of New York
description: Damask tablecloth with embroidered signatures of the guests in the position they sat at the table, including Ignace Jan Paderewski and dated 1896.
